answers.answer: your baby will be fine. Lol. enjoy being pregnant. eat what makes you happy, just make sure you eat other things healthy too.
A woman who eats a lot of sugar in her pregnancy does put her child at risk for diabetes, but if you keep things in check and only have something sweet every now and then, you should be fine.

question: I'm about 5 weeks now and have been hungry... Very hungry and also have a great desire for sweet things such as cakes, chocolate and sweets which I'm trying to substitute with fruits like apples and pears but it's not helping much. How will these sugar items affect my baby. I've already given in to cake and some sweets a couple of times... I'm just a bit worried
title: Sugar effects
